    About this Documentation

    This documentation was created for hosting on GitHub pages with Jekyll .

    The Jekyll theme was adapted from the Just the Docs repository on GitHub with some minimal custom HTML, CSS, and JS additions.

    Images of molecules were created with UCSF Chimera . … or just screenshot from MOLDEN (if I was lazy).
